testcase.classname: This feature verifies addto cart, remove, placing Order
testcase.name: checks remove item from cart
testcase.system-out: Given user is in login page.................................................passed Then views login and password and login button..............................passed Then enters username and Password and clicks on login button................passed And user lands to Home page and views Empty cart............................passed And adds item to cart.......................................................passed Then checks the count of the cart...........................................passed When user is in landing page................................................passed And clicks the cart and removes item from the cart and makes its empty......passed

testcase.classname: This feature verifies addto cart, remove, placing Order
testcase.name: verifies submitting shopping request
testcase.system-out: Given user is in login page.................................................passed Then views login and password and login button..............................passed Then enters username and Password and clicks on login button................passed And user lands to Home page and views Empty cart............................passed And adds item to cart.......................................................passed Then checks the count of the cart...........................................passed When user is in home page navigates to cart page............................passed Then clicks checkout........................................................passed Then enters details in your Information page and clicks continue............passed And navigates to Checkout Overview page and clicks finish...................passed And completes the checkout..................................................passed

testcase.name: Login to saucedemo admin page
